mapper.select: SELECT t.*, d.department_name FROM exam_time_slot t LEFT JOIN sys_department d ON t.department_id = d.id WHERE t.department_id = #{departmentId} AND t.date = #{date} AND t.status = 1 ORDER BY t.start_time

SELECT t.*, d.department_name FROM exam_time_slot t LEFT JOIN sys_department d ON t.department_id = d.id WHERE t.department_id = #{departmentId} AND t.date >= #{startDate} AND t.date <= #{endDate} AND t.status = 1 AND t.reserved < t.capacity ORDER BY t.date, t.start_time
mapper.update: UPDATE exam_time_slot SET reserved = reserved + #{delta}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND reserved + #{delta} >= 0 AND (#{delta} > 0 AND reserved < capacity OR #{delta} < 0)

UPDATE exam_time_slot SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id IN
#{id}
